cards: Dirty Secret! Reveal your most embarrassing bedroom moment or take 2 shots
Kiss and Tell! Share the name of your last hookup or take a big sip from your drink
Risky Text! Send 'You up?' to a random contact the group chooses, or drink twice
Sexy Spin! Spin the bottle (or use the wheel) to pick someone. Share your favorite position or take 3 sips
Confessions! What's the most public place you've done it? Spill the details or finish your drink
Truth or Strip! Answer a personal question chosen by the group or remove one item of clothing (down to your comfort level)
Body Shots! Let someone in the group take a body shot off you, or drink three times to pass
Spicy Dare! Let the group give you a dare that must stay within NSFW territoryâ€”or take a shot to opt out
